number of helpful: 1 person found this review helpful
content:
y 10
												There are way too many bugs in this game to enjoy it. Even with those fixed I wonder if my review would be any different...High On Racings is bad game. Not only because it's short (only 15 levels, which can be completed without any problems), but it also looks bad and doesn't have interesting gameplay. There are levels where ground plates shows incorrect turns and places where you will be trapped without any way out, forcing you to restart level. The achievements are way to easy to get (just beating levels to get them) and making some high scores aren't so hard too - "thanks" to some levels and this one trick you can use.I don't feel that High On Racing is even worth to get at 1/10 of price, so I suggest everyone to stay away from this game. There are plenty of better indie racing games.

												Hm... for an indie game made 10 years ago, It's not that bad.High On Racing Time and points racing runner with obvious retro looking, and fairly good music. Yeah, but only on big discount.Pro's:+ Can run on wooden computers+ Fun in short playing runs+ AchievementsCon's:- Price- This game is crying for Co-op- Overall graphic and textures- Should be released way more earlier than 2015

content:
ber 8, 2016
Product received for free
												Alright, so yes, I received this product for free. Because of this wonderful group that gives away free games to basically anyone who wants one! Feel free to joinAccidentallyReviewed hereLet's see, I put about 12 minutes into this game and I could already tell, that it is not even worth the price. List of Pro's, then list of con's.Pros:- If you are a little kid, this would be fune- Reminds me of games I used to play when I was 6 or 7Cons:- Way over-priced (never would I pay for this)- Plays like a free to play game- A few maps, but all are basically the same thing- Graphics are horrible (though it is a 2006 produced game)- Very few options to choose from.Would I recommend this game? Hell, no. If you have a younger one maybe, but it seems to be way over-priced so I would not budge for it.
